TEXT.TITLE: REXON <REXN> SHARE OFFERING UNDERWAY
TEXT.BODY: Rexon Inc said an offering of two mln common shares is underway at 13.25 dlrs per share through underwriters led by Hambrecht and Quist Inc. Underwriters have been granted an overallotment option for up to 300,000 more shares. Reuter
